short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will notify you when your favorite streamers change games.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep track of what your favorite streamers are playing by using this extension.

This extension notifies you every time someone in your list changes games.
You can allow or deny notifications per twitch streamer.
